survey_name: AI-Powered Mental Wellness App User Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and satisfaction with AI-powered mental wellness applications to improve future development and user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge user engagement levels with the app. Consider using a radio button for single selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered mental wellness app do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This question identifies which features are most valued by users. Ensure mobile-friendly design with checkboxes.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes), include an 'Other' option with a text input field.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered mental wellness app do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered mental wellness app overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Important for assessing overall user experience.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio button), display horizontally if space allows.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered mental wellness app overall?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered mental wellness app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered mental wellness app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered mental wellness app to others?
questions.client_notes: This question measures Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential. Use radio buttons for clarity.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this AI-powered mental wellness app to others?
